job_description:
Responsibilities: Company Overview: Wellspring Bangladesh Ltd. is the Bangladesh arm of Wellspring Global Pte Ltd, a Singapore-based consumer healthcare company. Our mission is to make essential wellness solutions‚Äîparticularly safe drinking water and fortified nutrition products‚Äîaccessible and affordable to underserved and mass-affluent populations in Bangladesh. All our efforts are aligned with key UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), focusing on public health, nutrition, and clean water. Position Overview: The TSM will lead the Territory sales operations, ensuring optimal market penetration, distributor/channel development, retail execution, and team leadership. This is a strategic role crucial to scaling revenue, expanding distribution, and building visibility for Wellspring‚Äôs product portfolio. Key Responsibilities: 1. Drive territory sales targets and execute the business plan. 2. Manage distributors, channels, stock, and secondary sales. 3. Ensure strong retail execution, visibility, and new outlet activation. 4. Lead, coach, and monitor field sales teams for productivity. 5. Expand market coverage and support regional activations. 6. Prepare sales, market, and competitor performance reports. 7. Ensure compliance, credit control, and risk management. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): ‚Ä¢ Target vs. Achievement (Revenue, Volume, Coverage) ‚Ä¢ Numeric and Weighted Distribution Growth ‚Ä¢ Active Outlet Count and New Outlet Activation ‚Ä¢ Sales Team Productivity (Call Rate, Order Strike Rate, Outlet Coverage) ‚Ä¢ Distributor ROI and Claim Processing Turnaround ‚Ä¢ Market Expansion Metrics (new sub-area/channel coverage) ‚Ä¢ Competitor Intelligence & Reporting Frequency Qualifications: ‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or relevant field. ‚Ä¢ 2‚Äì5 years of experience in sales management roles within the FMCG or Consumer Healthcare sector. ‚Ä¢ Proven success in managing distributors and building retail sales operations. ‚Ä¢ Strong leadership, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. ‚Ä¢ Tech-savvy with experience in using sales automation/CRM tools and Excel-based dashboards. ‚Ä¢ Willingness to travel extensively within the assigned region. Benefits: ‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and incentive structure ‚Ä¢ Travel allowance, mobile allowance, and performance bonuses ‚Ä¢ Opportunity to work with a purpose-driven and innovation-led organization ‚Ä¢ Fast-track career development and leadership grooming

Responsibilities: Serve as the primary point of contact for students and maintain strong, professional relationships

Understand students' academic and career goals and provide accurate guidance accordingly

Prepare, review, and verify admission and visa-related documents with attention to detail

Track and manage student file timelines for admission and visa processing

Ensure timely follow-ups and smooth coordination to meet client expectations

Arrange and coordinate meetings between students, clients, and internal teams

Provide regular status updates and reports to management

Address student queries, concerns, and complaints in a timely and professional manner

Escalate complex or sensitive issues to senior management when required

Conduct in-depth research on student visa requirements, eligibility criteria, and documentation checklists

- 1-2 years of relevant experience in research, documentation, student services, or education consultancy (Fresh graduates with strong skills and willingness to learn may also apply)
- Basic understanding of international student admission and visa processes will be an advantage
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English (Bangla proficiency required)
- Strong documentation, drafting, and proofreading skills
- Good research and analytical abilities with attention to detail
- Ability to manage multiple student files and meet deadlines effectively
- Proficient in MS Office and Google Workspace (Word, Excel, Docs, Sheets, Email)
- Strong interpersonal and relationship management skills
- Customer-oriented, responsible, and professional work attitude
- Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively within a team
